system.name: Tough Tumble Rank 1
system.effect:
Your Pok√©mon with at least 3d6 in their Tough Stat from Poffins may activate Tough Tumble as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.
Rank 1: Scary Face, Spite
system.prerequisites: Style Expert, Tough as Chosen Stat, Novice Intimidate
